Content.Text:
<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's about time to go back.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Time's about up.
I'm hungry, let's go back.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're back, <MYNAME>.
I put your animals back where they
belong. See you later.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're finally back. 
I put your animals back where they
belong, so you can head home.

What a fun day!
I'm so tired though...
I want to get to bed!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, <MYNAME>!
Aw, unbelievable.
I guess I have to carry you to town.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>.
Hang in there!
I'll get you to town right away!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
You need to stop overdoing it.
I was shocked when you fainted there in
the Animal Sanctuary!
<PAGE>
I put your animals back where they
belong, so you should go get some sleep.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Man, you had me worried!
If you're that tired, you should say
something!
<PAGE>
I put your animals back where they
belong, so call it a day and go to bed!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What in the world were you thinking?
Of COURSE you are going to end up
fainting if you overdo it like that!
<PAGE>
What, you were... having too much fun!
That's your excuse?
What are you, a little kid?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
You really had me worried!
What a tiring day!

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
So take the day off to rest!
Understand?

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
That's a relief...
You really had me worried. When you
fainted, I didn't know what to do.

I'm going to sleep.
Good night...
